synopsis.text:
Zhang Qiling, a mysterious figure, covertly aids Wu Xie, an adventurer who finds himself drawn back to the enigmatic Qinling Mountains. After two thrilling escapades in Nansha, Wu Xie returns to Hangzhou only to receive a call from his estranged childhood companion, Lao Yang. Lao Yang reminisces about their shared adventure in the Qinling Mountain hinterlands three years prior and extends an invitation to Wu Xie to revisit the ancient ruins.

Embarking on this new journey, Wu Xie and Lao Yang stumble upon a colossal taimen fish, a breathtaking underground waterfall, and an incomprehensibly ancient sacred tree. The duo's exploration promises to unravel the secrets of the past while Zhang Qiling continues to offer clandestine support. This captivating anime intertwines friendship, mystery, and adventure, ensuring an enthralling experience for viewers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
